website_summaries.verdict: If you don't need more than 3 pairs of glasses and don't mind the price, this trio delivers stylish and safe eclipse viewing.
pros: Attractive paper eclipse viewing glasses by a company known for its CE and ISO safety standards
cons: Considering you only get 3 pairs, it's an expensive pick

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: These were used for the solar eclipse. I saw a partial one and my boyfriend was in a place where you could see the full solar eclipse. In both cases it worked really well and we both still have our terrible vision (it didn't get any worse, ha ha). I also was able to get some cool photos on my phone by using the lens over my phone's camera.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient for 1x use
customer_reviews.text: Film "lenses" in cardstock "frames". Given this is essentially a 1x use, not a problem. Cannot vouch for how well they worked because it was too cloudy to actually see anything the day of the eclipse.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory and Safe Way to Watch the Eclipse
customer_reviews.text: The eclipse is over, and these were great. The instructions say that they should be discarded after three years, so there is no reason to keep them. By the time of the next eclipse in 2014, there will certainly be new technology.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Great product for looking at the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to post a review until after the eclipse- but the glasses worked perfectly. I bought them as they were made from a reputable brand (I didn't want to go blind). They came as described and worked just as they were supposed to (i.e. I got to watch the eclipse as it happened and I didn't burn my eyes out or go blind!)
customer_reviews.author: ALLFLUKSD

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got these glasses to
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these glasses to watch the solar eclipse. They are the safest ones available with all of the certifications. I didn't need three glasses, but gave one pair away to a stranger who said she did not have glasses. My neighbor and I used the other two to watch the eclipse.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hills

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for the once in a lifetime solar eclipse ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for the once in a lifetime solar eclipse. They were cardboard and I had to hold on to them with one hand. They blocked the UVA rays so I felt confident about protecting my eyes. I bought the 3 pack so co-worker could use too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These glasses worked great. I was able to view the entire eclipse. It was spectacular. I live in the Kansas City area, so I was able to see totality. Very impressive. I am glad I bought these glasses. I gave a pair to my daughter and took an extra pair with me. Someone in the same parking area as me, needed a pair. I didn't ask for payment, but they paid me. I was just glad to help.

customer_reviews.title: They are adjustable providing a great fit, and the LED lights are bright or ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed to included head torches for our camping trips, and ordered two of these. So far, they've met every expectation and then some. They are adjustable providing a great fit, and the LED lights are bright or dimmable depending on your needs and the strobe light features was an added bonus. I love the fact the batteries are rechargeable. Very pleased with the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Great Solar Eclipse Glasses!

Since we only needed 2 pair, we used the extra glasses on my iphone camera lens, allowing me to take pictures and videos of the eclipse. Very pleased with my order and intend on ordering more for the 2024 eclipse!
